Uses of Class
com.andreamazzon.session5.abstractclasses.simulators.StochasticProcessSimulator

  • Packages that use StochasticProcessSimulator 
    Package Description
    com.andreamazzon.session5.abstractclasses.simulators
    The classes in this package give a more complex example of inheritance in combination with composition: an abstract class StochasticProcessSimulator is defined, whose aim is the simulation of a general stochastic process.

    • Uses of StochasticProcessSimulator in com.andreamazzon.session5.abstractclasses.simulators

      Subclasses of StochasticProcessSimulator in com.andreamazzon.session5.abstractclasses.simulators 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BinomialModelSimulator
      This class is used in order to simulate some paths of a binomial model: discrete model for a stochastic process S, such that every time i we have S(i+1)=S(i)*M(i), where M(i)=u>1 with probability p and M(i)=d<1 with probability 1-p.
      class  TrinomialModelSimulator
      This class is used in order to simulate some paths of a trinomial model: discrete model for a stochastic process S, such that every time i we have S(i+1)=S(i)*M(i), where M(i)=u>1 with probability p_1, M(i) = 1 with probability p_2, M(i)=d<1 with probability 1-p_1-p_2.
